text: Welcome to DU! The truly grassroots left-of-center political community where regular people, not algorithms, drive the discussions and set the standards. (Original Post) Yo_Mama_Been_Loggin 1 hr ago OP [MagaSmash](/?com=profile&uid=366977) (7,310 posts)1. Putin has trump by the BALLS. trump needs the Flattery. [TwilightZone](/?com=profile&uid=152177) (27,009 posts)2. No one should have been shocked. He's been saying stuff like this for years. [Wiz Imp](/?com=profile&uid=164516) (524 posts)3. That was even far worse than I imagined However, I did find it interesting that his audience did not react at all to his horrible comments. I think he thinks this is a winning argument but clearly it is not. His crowd isn't even buying it. [Skittles](/?com=profile&uid=104905) (157,132 posts)4. he's gone beyond ridiculous he sounds like someone on a city street corner ranting about end of times If anybody else said these things, there'd be calls to lock them up. But the MSM didn't even report on this - like it's perfectly normal for a candidate for US President explicitly call for the US to totally abandon one of it's allies. Shameful (if the MSM had any shame) [Skittles](/?com=profile&uid=104905) (157,132 posts)6. he's a white male repuke no standards at all meanwhile, women, ESPECIALLY women of color, are held to impossible standards
